devdoc.author: Juan Castellon
devdoc.details: Platform contract will allow  KMP Platform users to create  their own company and create their own tokens and persist the data in the Blockchain.

activateEmergency().details: Circuit breaker switch to pause this contract state changes or resume.

constructor.details: Platform contract owner is set on this constructor.

createCompany(string,string,string,strin.details: This function lets users to create their company on the platform.

params.companyName: name we will give to this company.
params.did: company uPort id (not used for now).
params.uPortAddress: company uport Ethr address (not used for now).

createTokenForCompany(address,string,str.details: This function lets users to create a token on one of their companies.

params.bcCompany: address of the company that owns this token.
params.name: token's name.

createTokenForCompany(address,string,str.return: The instance of the token just created.

getUserTokenBalance(address,address,addr.details: Retrieves the balance of a user for an specific token on a company.

params.user: the address of the user that owns this token.

modifyOwner(address).details: This function will allow the owner of the contract to transfer  ownership to a new owner.

devdoc.title: Platform main contract to expose functionality to users.
